author: kkolinko
msg: Correct typo, add note about licensing

author: kkolinko
msg: Do not include Cobertura and instrumented classes into the junit classpath, unless Cobertura is enabled.
This allows to turn Cobertura off and on at any time.
This avoids "mkdir ${cobertura.home}" that breaks builds at Apache Gump.

author: kkolinko
